articles.author: Camilo  Montoya-Galvez, Joe  Walsh
articles.title: Minneapolis becomes ground zero in Trump's immigration crackdown: Arrests, protests and 2 fatal shootings by agents - CBS News
articles.description: The fatal shooting of Alex Pretti by Border Patrol agents has further inflamed tensions in Minneapolis, a city at the center of America's immigration debate in recent months. Here's a look at how it started.
articles.content: The fatal shooting of 37-year-old Alex Pretti by Border Patrol agents on Saturday has further escalated tensions in Minneapolis, a city now at the center of America's heated battle over immigration e… [+17132 chars]

articles.title: Mikaela Shiffrin wins last slalom before Olympics and locks up record ninth season discipline title - AP News
articles.description: Mikaela Shiffrin has locked up the World Cup slalom title with two races to spare and became the first skier with nine season titles in one discipline. The American star dominated the last slalom before the Olympics as she won both runs to beat runner-up Cami…
articles.content: SPINDLERUV MLYN, Czech Republic (AP) Mikaela Shiffrin has locked up the slalom season title with the Olympics looming to become the first skier in the six-decade history of the World Cup with nine se… [+3187 chars]
